member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC.AlphaToCoverageEnable
member.summary: Determines whether or not to use alpha-to-coverage as a multisampling technique when setting a pixel to a rendertarget.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC.BlendEnable
member.summary: Enable (or disable) blending. There are eight elements in this array; these correspond to the eight rendertargets that can be set to output-merger stage at one time.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC.SrcBlend
member.summary: This specifies the first RGB data source and includes an optional pre-blend operation.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC.DestBlend
member.summary: This specifies the second RGB data source and includes an optional pre-blend operation.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC.BlendOp
member.summary: This defines how to combine the RGB data sources.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC.SrcBlendAlpha
member.summary: This specifies the first alpha data source and includes an optional pre-blend operation. Blend options that end in _COLOR are not allowed.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC.DestBlendAlpha
member.summary: This specifies the second alpha data source and includes an optional pre-blend operation. Blend options that end in _COLOR are not allowed.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC.BlendOpAlpha
member.summary: This defines how to combine the alpha data sources.

member.name: D3D10_BLEND_DESC.RenderTargetWriteMask
member.summary: A per-pixel write mask that allows control over which components can be written (see ).
